title: Log in
explanation:
Please supply login credentials for a valid account on your SignalK server. These credentials are used for storing the settings of the app in the server. Your password will not be stored on the device. 

 Hint: if you want to log in less often, you can increase the 'Login session timeout' parameter in the server's security settings.

fields.label: Api key to OpenWeatherMap, if you have it.
